belongs_to_collection.name: Mrs. Brown's Boys: The Original Series

original_title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: How Now Mrs. Brown
overview: After overhearing a "secret" family meeting about putting her into a "home" Agnes Brown decides to prove herself fit and sane to the rest of the Brown family. But does passing out after jogging once around the house prove her fit? Or does giving herself a "Brazilian" locked in a cupboard prove her sane?  Welcome to Part 6 in the Brown family saga - more mayhem, more hilarious and bizarre events that only the Brown family can generate!
title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: How Now Mrs. Brown
